CurrentVersion.description: Admins can configure permission settings for Viva Learning content by learning provider, ie. hide all content from a certain connected learning provider from certain users.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Configure Viva Learning permissions by provider
OldVersion.description: Admins can configure permission settings for Viva Learning content by learning provider, ie. hide all content from a certain connected learning provider from certain users.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Manage and curate interest inventory for your tenant
CurrentVersion.description:
Admins can curate interest inventory for their tenant, enabling learners with personalized experience to pursue learning with these interests.

More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/viva/learning/interests

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Manage Interests - Curate Interest inventory for your tenant
OldVersion.description:
Admins can curate interest inventory for their tenant, enabling learners with personalized experience to pursue learning with these interests.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/viva/learning/interests

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery (Premium) - Export API
CurrentVersion.description:
,
The Export function plays an integral role in eDiscovery. After a review set is added, with use of this Export API, organizations can create export jobs and get the download URL to successfully download the export created in a programmatic manner. This API will enable external applications and partners to successfully integrate the eDiscovery export function through scripting.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery (Premium) - Export API
OldVersion.description: ,The Export function plays an integral role in eDiscovery. After a review set is added, with use of this Export API, organizations can create export jobs and get the download URL to successfully download the export created in a programmatic manner. This API will enable external applications and partners to successfully integrate the eDiscovery export function through scripting.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Labeling email from attachments' label in Outlook on the web
CurrentVersion.description: ,Outlook on the web will match the highest sensitivity label from attachments on email. Admin could configure this either use the cmdlet set-labelpolicy advanced setting or use the Compliance portal to configure the label policy(Roadmap: 100158). Customer will see automatically or recommendations that email gets the higher label from attachments' label.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Labeling email from attachments' label in Outlook on the web
OldVersion.description: ,Outlook on the web will match the highest sensitivity label from attachments on email. Admin could configure this either use the cmdlet set-labelpolicy advanced setting or use the Compliance portal to configure the label policy(Roadmap: 100158). Customer will see automatically or recommendations that email gets the higher label from attachments' label.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit Search Graph API
CurrentVersion.description: ,Microsoft Graph offers a unified API endpoint for accessing data from multiple Microsoft cloud services in a single response. This feature allows our customers to programmatically access the new async Audit Search experience, which also provides improved reliability and search completeness, through Microsoft Graph API.

OldVersion.description: ,Microsoft Graph offers a unified API endpoint for accessing data from multiple Microsoft cloud services in a single response. This feature allows our customers to programmatically access the new async Audit Search experience, which also provides improved reliability and search completeness, through Microsoft Graph API.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Admin Units support for DLP alerts in Microsoft 365 Defender portal
CurrentVersion.description: With this capability we are extending the Admin Units capability currently available in Microsoft Purview Information Protection and Data Loss Prevention (DLP) to DLP alerts in the Microsoft 365 Defender portal.

OldVersion.description: With this capability we are extending the Admin Units capability currently available in Microsoft Purview Information Protection and Data Loss Prevention (DLP) to DLP alerts in the Microsoft 365 Defender portal.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Enhancements to app and risky browsing activity evidence
CurrentVersion.description: This update provides two enhancements to app and risky browsing activities that may lead to a data security incident in forensic evidence. Admins with appropriate permissions will no longer need to enable browsing indicators from the insider risk settings page to gain visual insights of these activities. In addition, the feature has been updated with more precise detection when users switch between tabs and windows. This results in more reliable visual evidence insights when context is switched in the browser. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: The roadmap item was inadvertently marked rolling out and has now been corrected. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Enhancements to app and risky browsing activity evidence
OldVersion.description: This update provides two enhancements to app and risky browsing activities that may lead to a data security incident in forensic evidence. Admins with appropriate permissions will no longer need to enable browsing indicators from the insider risk settings page to gain visual insights of these activities. In addition, the feature has been updated with more precise detection when users switch between tabs and windows. This results in more reliable visual evidence insights when context is switched in the browser. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: The roadmap item was inadvertently marked rolling out and has now been corrected. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Collaborative Notes in Channel Meetings
CurrentVersion.description: Collaborative Notes will replace Wiki-based Channel Meeting Notes. Collaborative Notes in channel meetings allow attendees to co-create and collaborate on their meeting agenda, notes, and action items. Since Collaborative Notes are a Loop component, it is always in sync regardless of how many places they live in. Assigned Tasks in Collaborative Notes automatically sync with To Do and Planner.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Collaborative Notes in Channel Meetings
OldVersion.description:
Collaborative Notes will replace Wiki-based Channel
Meeting Notes. Collaborative Notes in channel meetings allow attendees to
co-create and collaborate on their meeting agenda, notes, and action items.
Since Collaborative Notes are a Loop component, it is always in sync regardless
of how many places they live in. Assigned Tasks in Collaborative Notes
automatically sync with To Do and Planner.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New Teams Logs for Microsoft Purview Audit Standard Users
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Microsoft Purview is expanding access to wider cloud security activity events for Microsoft Teams. As part of the changes, standard users of Purview Audit will begin to generate 15 new Microsoft Teams events that were previously generated only for Audit Premium licensed users. The following events will now be provided for all Audit Standard users: 1. MeetingParticipantDetail; 2. MessageSent; 3. MessagesListed; 4. MeetingDetail; 5. MessageUpdated; 6. ChatRetrieved; 7. MessageRead; 8. MessageHostedContentRead; 9. ChatCreated; 10. ChatUpdated; 11. MessageCreatedNotification; 12. MessageDeletedNotification; 13. MessageUpdatedNotification; 14. SubscribedToMessages; 15. MessageHostedContentsListed

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New Teams Logs for Microsoft Purview Audit Standard Users
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Purview is expanding access to wider cloud security activity events for Microsoft Teams. As part of the changes, standard users of Purview Audit will begin to generate 15 new Microsoft Teams events that were previously generated only for Audit Premium licensed users. The following events will now be provided for all Audit Standard users: 1. MeetingParticipantDetail; 2. MessageSent; 3. MessagesListed; 4. MeetingDetail; 5. MessageUpdated; 6. ChatRetrieved; 7. MessageRead; 8. MessageHostedContentRead; 9. ChatCreated; 10. ChatUpdated; 11. MessageCreatedNotification; 12. MessageDeletedNotification; 13. MessageUpdatedNotification; 14. SubscribedToMessages; 15. MessageHostedContentsListed

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Cloud-based Message Recall on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows for GCC, GCC High, and DoD
CurrentVersion.description: We will be enabling Cloud-based Message Recall on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows, a feature that is already available in world-wide multitenant, for customers in GCC, GCC High, and DoD.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Cloud-based Message Recall on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows for GCC, GCC High, and DoD
OldVersion.description: We will be enabling Cloud-based Message Recall on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows, a feature that is already available in world-wide multitenant, for customers in GCC, GCC High, and DoD.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New Meeting Option and Meeting Policy "Turn off copying or forwarding of meeting chat" (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: "Turn off copying or forwarding of meeting chat" is a new meeting option that gives meeting organizer the option to disable copying and sharing features on meeting chat messages for participants in order to reduce the risk of data leak. Once this restriction is enabled, meeting chat participants will not be able to copy chat messages using menu option or keyboard shortcut, forward messages or share messages to Outlook. There is also a new Meeting Policy setting in Teams admin center for admin to control whether user can see or use this feature in Meeting Options page. Admin can also set the default value for this meeting option in Meeting Templates they create.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New Meeting Option and Meeting Policy "Turn off copying or forwarding of meeting chat" (Premium)
OldVersion.description: "Turn off copying or forwarding of meeting chat" is a new meeting option that gives meeting organizer the option to disable copying and sharing features on meeting chat messages for participants in order to reduce the risk of data leak. Once this restriction is enabled, meeting chat participants will not be able to copy chat messages using menu option or keyboard shortcut, forward messages or share messages to Outlook. There is also a new Meeting Policy setting in Teams admin center for admin to control whether user can see or use this feature in Meeting Options page. Admin can also set the default value for this meeting option in Meeting Templates they create.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: SharePoint Hub Analytics for US Government Clouds
CurrentVersion.description: View, Viewer, dwell time and content level analytics aggregated at a SharePoint Hub level. These features are an enhancement to the existing site and page level analytics in SharePoint.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: SharePoint Hub Analytics for US Government Clouds
OldVersion.description: View, Viewer, dwell time and content level analytics aggregated at a SharePoint Hub level. These features are an enhancement to the existing site and page level analytics in SharePoint.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Weekly active user reporting
CurrentVersion.description: Total number of unique users who have launched the Viva Learning personal app in the last 7 days.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Weekly Active User Reporting in Viva Learning
OldVersion.description: Total number of unique users who have launched the Viva Learning personal app in the last 7 days.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: View, download and delete OneDrive transcript files in Teams
CurrentVersion.description: We are simplifying the storage and management of meeting transcript files by focusing transcript actions such as view, download, and delete to source from one place (OneDrive for Business) instead of two places (OneDrive for Business and Exchange Online).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Teams admin center - external domain activity report
CurrentVersion.description: The external domain activity report will show Teams administrators which domains their users communicate with. Available for both those with open federation on and those with explicit allow lists.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Teams admin center - external domain activity report
OldVersion.description: The external domain activity report will show Teams administrators which domains their users communicate with. Available for both those with open federation on and those with explicit allow lists.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance-Detect Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 interactions template
CurrentVersion.description: Communication Compliance is introducing a new template dedicated to analyzing all Copilot for Microsoft 365 prompts and responses, to help ensure content prohibited by customers’ policies, such as harassing or threatening language, is not being used Copilot for Microsoft 365 interfaces. This scales Communication Compliance’s reach, consistent with Microsoft 365’s expanding interfaces. In addition, administrators are also able to select Copilot chats as a checked location in the policy creation wizard for any new or existing policies. This empowers administrators to fine-tune their management strategy precisely to their organization’s needs, with a focus on user privacy protection. Whether it's setting specific conditions or deploying trainable classifiers, this feature provides flexibility and adaptability in compliance management, ensuring your organization's communications remain secure, compliant, and respectful of user privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance-Detect Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 interactions template
OldVersion.description: Communication Compliance is introducing a new template dedicated to analyzing all Copilot for Microsoft 365 prompts and responses, to help ensure content prohibited by customers’ policies, such as harassing or threatening language, is not being used Copilot for Microsoft 365 interfaces. This scales Communication Compliance’s reach, consistent with Microsoft 365’s expanding interfaces. In addition, administrators are also able to select Copilot chats as a checked location in the policy creation wizard for any new or existing policies. This empowers administrators to fine-tune their management strategy precisely to their organization’s needs, with a focus on user privacy protection. Whether it's setting specific conditions or deploying trainable classifiers, this feature provides flexibility and adaptability in compliance management, ensuring your organization's communications remain secure, compliant, and respectful of user privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management-Insider Risk Management supports multicloud environments
CurrentVersion.description: ,Insider Risk Management extends its detection into multicloud environments by offering ready-to-use risk indicators in Azure, AWS, and SaaS apps including Box, Dropbox, and Google Drive. Organizations can use these new indicators in data theft and data leaks policies. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Outlook win32 DLP Policy tip and oversharing popup support for new DLP Predicates
CurrentVersion.description: ,Introducing two new DLP Exchange predicates support for DLP Policy tips and Oversharing popups for E5 users: "Message contains" and "Attachment contains" with a focus on client-side evaluation on specific email components like email body or attachments only. Unlike the broader "Content contains" predicate that evaluated entire email envelope, these enable targeted DLP evaluation on specific email components only and show DLP Policy tips and oversharing popups accordingly in Outlook win32.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Message/Attachment contains EXO predicates
CurrentVersion.description: ,Introducing two new DLP Exchange predicates: "Message contains" and "Attachment contains" with a focus on DLP evaluation on specific email components like email body or attachments only. Unlike the broader "Content contains" predicate that evaluated entire email envelope, these enable targeted DLP evaluation on specific email components only.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Saved views in Activity explorer
CurrentVersion.description: During an alert investigation, analysts usually use various filters and columns in activity explorer to understand the risk activities that may lead to potential data security incidents. With this update, an Insider Risk Management analyst can quickly use a previously configured combination of filters and columns with one click. This can help analysts efficiently work through recurring activities without manually setting up filters every time. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Co-organizer updates in town hall
CurrentVersion.description: Co-organizers can edit town hall details, publish the event, and cancel the event, similar to the organizer.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Co-organizer updates in town hall
OldVersion.description: Co-organizers can edit town hall details, publish the event, and cancel the event, similar to the organizer.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Privacy statement customization in Virtual Appointments
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can customize the privacy statement shown to attendees joining the appointment to address specific considerations and concerns for their online engagement. Admins can update the content for the privacy statement under the privacy profile in the Microsoft Admin Center.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Privacy statement customization in Virtual Appointments
OldVersion.description: Admins can customize the privacy statement shown to attendees joining the appointment to address specific considerations and concerns for their online engagement. Admins can update the content for the privacy statement under the privacy profile in the Microsoft Admin Center.

CurrentVersion.title: Exchange: Microsoft Defender for Office 365 - Quarantine End User Allow and Block list management
CurrentVersion.description: We are Updating the experience for end user allow and block list management of their emails. With one click, end users will block emails from unwanted senders and prevent those emails from showing up in their default quarantine view anymore as well as in their Quarantine notifications. End users will also be able to allow emails from trusted senders and prevent future emails from those senders from landing in quarantine given there are no Admin overrides in place. End users will also have visibility into Admin overrides that led to a Quarantined email message if there is one.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Streamlined False positive submission for Quarantined files from OneDrive, Teams, and SharePoint
CurrentVersion.description: We are providing an easy and robust way  for Admins and security operators to submit and temporary mitigate False positive files that have been Quarantined from the OneDrive, Teams and SharePoint workload.

,
Microsoft Purview is expanding access to wider cloud security activity events for Microsoft Teams. As part of the changes, standard users of Purview Audit will begin to generate 15 new Microsoft Teams events that were previously generated only for Audit Premium licensed users. The following events will now be provided for all Audit Standard users: 1. MeetingParticipantDetail; 2. MessageSent; 3. MessagesListed; 4. MeetingDetail; 5. MessageUpdated; 6. ChatRetrieved; 7. MessageRead; 8. MessageHostedContentRead; 9. ChatCreated; 10. ChatUpdated; 11. MessageCreatedNotification; 12. MessageDeletedNotification; 13. MessageUpdatedNotification; 14. SubscribedToMessages; 15. MessageHostedContentsListed

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Cloud-based Message Recall on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows for GCC, GCC High, and DoD
CurrentVersion.description: We will be enabling Cloud-based Message Recall on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows, a feature that is already available in world-wide multitenant, for customers in GCC, GCC High, and DoD.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New Meeting Option and Meeting Policy "Turn off copying or forwarding of meeting chat" (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: "Turn off copying or forwarding of meeting chat" is a new meeting option that gives meeting organizer the option to disable copying and sharing features on meeting chat messages for participants in order to reduce the risk of data leak. Once this restriction is enabled, meeting chat participants will not be able to copy chat messages using menu option or keyboard shortcut, forward messages or share messages to Outlook. There is also a new Meeting Policy setting in Teams admin center for admin to control whether user can see or use this feature in Meeting Options page. Admin can also set the default value for this meeting option in Meeting Templates they create.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: SharePoint Hub Analytics for US Government Clouds
CurrentVersion.description: View, Viewer, dwell time and content level analytics aggregated at a SharePoint Hub level. These features are an enhancement to the existing site and page level analytics in SharePoint.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Weekly active user reporting
CurrentVersion.description: Total number of unique users who have launched the Viva Learning personal app in the last 7 days.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: View, download and delete OneDrive transcript files in Teams
CurrentVersion.description: We are simplifying the storage and management of meeting transcript files by focusing transcript actions such as view, download, and delete to source from one place (OneDrive for Business) instead of two places (OneDrive for Business and Exchange Online).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Teams admin center - external domain activity report
CurrentVersion.description: The external domain activity report will show Teams administrators which domains their users communicate with. Available for both those with open federation on and those with explicit allow lists.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance-Detect Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 interactions template
CurrentVersion.description: Communication Compliance is introducing a new template dedicated to analyzing all Copilot for Microsoft 365 prompts and responses, to help ensure content prohibited by customers’ policies, such as harassing or threatening language, is not being used Copilot for Microsoft 365 interfaces. This scales Communication Compliance’s reach, consistent with Microsoft 365’s expanding interfaces. In addition, administrators are also able to select Copilot chats as a checked location in the policy creation wizard for any new or existing policies. This empowers administrators to fine-tune their management strategy precisely to their organization’s needs, with a focus on user privacy protection. Whether it's setting specific conditions or deploying trainable classifiers, this feature provides flexibility and adaptability in compliance management, ensuring your organization's communications remain secure, compliant, and respectful of user privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management-Insider Risk Management supports multicloud environments
CurrentVersion.description: ,Insider Risk Management extends its detection into multicloud environments by offering ready-to-use risk indicators in Azure, AWS, and SaaS apps including Box, Dropbox, and Google Drive. Organizations can use these new indicators in data theft and data leaks policies. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Outlook win32 DLP Policy tip and oversharing popup support for new DLP Predicates
CurrentVersion.description: ,Introducing two new DLP Exchange predicates support for DLP Policy tips and Oversharing popups for E5 users: "Message contains" and "Attachment contains" with a focus on client-side evaluation on specific email components like email body or attachments only. Unlike the broader "Content contains" predicate that evaluated entire email envelope, these enable targeted DLP evaluation on specific email components only and show DLP Policy tips and oversharing popups accordingly in Outlook win32.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Message/Attachment contains EXO predicates
CurrentVersion.description: ,Introducing two new DLP Exchange predicates: "Message contains" and "Attachment contains" with a focus on DLP evaluation on specific email components like email body or attachments only. Unlike the broader "Content contains" predicate that evaluated entire email envelope, these enable targeted DLP evaluation on specific email components only.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Saved views in Activity explorer
CurrentVersion.description: During an alert investigation, analysts usually use various filters and columns in activity explorer to understand the risk activities that may lead to potential data security incidents. With this update, an Insider Risk Management analyst can quickly use a previously configured combination of filters and columns with one click. This can help analysts efficiently work through recurring activities without manually setting up filters every time. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Co-organizer updates in town hall
CurrentVersion.description: Co-organizers can edit town hall details, publish the event, and cancel the event, similar to the organizer.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Privacy statement customization in Virtual Appointments
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can customize the privacy statement shown to attendees joining the appointment to address specific considerations and concerns for their online engagement. Admins can update the content for the privacy statement under the privacy profile in the Microsoft Admin Center.

CurrentVersion.title: Exchange: Microsoft Defender for Office 365 - Quarantine End User Allow and Block list management
CurrentVersion.description: We are Updating the experience for end user allow and block list management of their emails. With one click, end users will block emails from unwanted senders and prevent those emails from showing up in their default quarantine view anymore as well as in their Quarantine notifications. End users will also be able to allow emails from trusted senders and prevent future emails from those senders from landing in quarantine given there are no Admin overrides in place. End users will also have visibility into Admin overrides that led to a Quarantined email message if there is one.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Streamlined False positive submission for Quarantined files from OneDrive, Teams, and SharePoint
CurrentVersion.description: We are providing an easy and robust way  for Admins and security operators to submit and temporary mitigate False positive files that have been Quarantined from the OneDrive, Teams and SharePoint workload.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Employee learning API content sync
CurrentVersion.description: Content Sync API, which enables learning content hosted on learning systems to show up across the Viva Learning user experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Browser-optimized playback for SAP SuccessFactors content
CurrentVersion.description: Desktop client content consumption for SuccessFactors content is enhanced with browser optimized playback.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Academies in Viva Learning
CurrentVersion.description: Academies in Viva Learning provide a guided learning experience to employees to improve their skills.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - learning path creation
CurrentVersion.description: ,Admins can create learning paths from learning objects in Viva Learning. Learning paths are discoverable, consumable, and shareable by employees at the organization.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Live meeting status for mobile
CurrentVersion.description: Teams calendar on mobile devices displays the live status of a meeting with avatars of the participants who are in the call, whether the meeting is being recorded and the duration of the meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Progress tracking for learning paths
CurrentVersion.description: Now in Viva Learning, users will be able to track their progress on different courses within the Learning path.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Manual course completion
CurrentVersion.description: Users can mark a course as complete in Viva learning.
